1.1.name: wordpress/trim-admin-menu
1.1.description:
Hide menu items in the admin interface from non-admin users. It's still possible for them to access the corresponding pages by entering the URL directly.

This plug-in perfectly complements Admin Trim Interface, a plug-in capable of hiding other elements of the admin interface.

Please note that the administrator isn't affected by the changes.
